steps.name: Prepare team via backend (sender team + receiver team) with owners and members
Login as receiver team member in Android app
Register sender device and send connection request to receiver via backend
Assert sender connection request is visible and open the request from conversation list
Verify connection request UI and accept the request
Verify connection accepted toast and start a conversation with sender
Assert conversation with sender is visible in conversation view
Receive and assert audio file message in conversation
Play audio message and verify playback time progresses
Open audio message actions and verify bottom sheet options
Download audio file and verify success toast
Receive image file and open download modal
Download image file and verify success toast
Receive text file and open download modal
Download text file and verify success toast
